content: Once you've decided what to craft at the DIY Bench and gathered all the materials, press <color=#38b6c5>Spacebar</color> to select the DIY Bench.
info: 采集树枝-莫白-完成_主流程文本2

content: <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, have you gathered the <color=#8AAB4B>5 branches</color> needed for crafting?
info: 采集树枝-莫白-完成_主流程文本2

content:
In the DIY Card list at the DIY Bench,
select the fishing rod,
then <color=#38b6c5>Start Crafting</color> to complete the process.
info: 采集树枝-莫白-完成_主流程文本2

content:
Tree branches are truly versatile materials.
Let's get started right away
on making a fishing rod.
info: 采集树枝-莫白-完成_主流程文本2
